Account_Certification_Set_Data.description: The company or company hierarchy for the Account Certification Set. When updating an existing Account Certification Set, you cannot change the company/company hierarchy.

validation.validation: You can't change the Company field on an Account Certification Set.
All companies in the company hierarchy must have the same primary account set.
All companies in the company hierarchy must have the same primary fiscal schedule.
All companies in the company hierarchy must have the same ledger currency.
